comments: Last show in which set changes from blue to red in Double Jeopardy! Round, apart from #3090.

clues.clue: In 1918 Roald Amundsen was attacked by one of these large white animals

final_jeopardy.clue: Napoleon's plans to invade England were dashed by this October 21, 1805 battle
